# kABPersonAlternateBirthdayProperty

**Global Variable**

The associated value is a [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABDictionaryPropertyType] with keys specified by the other constants listed here.

## Declaration

```swift
let kABPersonAlternateBirthdayProperty: ABPropertyID
```

## Discussion

You can use toll-free bridging to cast the value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSDictionary]. The data corresponds to an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSDateComponents] object.

## Deprecated

- **kABPersonAddressCityKey**: City.
- **kABPersonAddressCountryCodeKey**: Country code. The value is an ISO country code.
- **kABPersonAddressCountryKey**: Country or region.
- **kABPersonAddressProperty**: Identifier for the address multivalue property.
- **kABPersonAddressStateKey**: State.
- **kABPersonAddressStreetKey**: Street.
- **kABPersonAddressZIPKey**: Zip code.
- **kABPersonAlternateBirthdayCalendarIdentifierKey**: The associated value is a string representing the calendar identifier for a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFCalendar].
- **kABPersonAlternateBirthdayDayKey**: The associated value is a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumber] of type [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumberType/nsIntegerType] whose value is the day for the birthday.
- **kABPersonAlternateBirthdayEraKey**: The associated value is a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumber] of type [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumberType/nsIntegerType] whose value is the era for the birthday.
- **kABPersonAlternateBirthdayIsLeapMonthKey**: The associated value is a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumber] of type [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumberType/charType].
- **kABPersonAlternateBirthdayMonthKey**: The associated value is a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumber] of type [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumberType/nsIntegerType] whose value is the month for the birthday.
- **kABPersonAlternateBirthdayYearKey**: The associated value is a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumber] of type [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFNumberType/nsIntegerType] whose value is the year for the birthday.
- **kABPersonAnniversaryLabel**: Birthdate.
- **kABPersonAssistantLabel**: Assistant.
